description: Sustainable cities and communities — Indicators for city services and quality of life

indicators.name: Unemployment Rate
indicators.description: City's unemployment rate

indicators.name: Commercial and Industrial Property Values
indicators.description: Assessed value of commercial and industrial properties as a percentage of total assessed value of all properties

indicators.name: Population Living in Poverty
indicators.description: Percentage of city population living in poverty

indicators.name: Full-time Employment
indicators.description: Percentage of persons in fulltime employment

indicators.name: Youth Unemployment Rate
indicators.description: Youth unemployment rate

indicators.name: Number of Businesses
indicators.description: Number of businesses per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Number of New Patents
indicators.description: Number of new patents per 100 000 population per year

indicators.name: Female Student Enrolment
indicators.description: Percentage of female school-aged population enrolled in school

indicators.name: Primary Education Completion
indicators.description: Percentage of students completing primary education: Survival rate

indicators.name: Secondary Education Completion
indicators.description: Percentage of students completing secondary education: Survival rate

indicators.name: Student/Teacher Ratio
indicators.description: Primary education student/teacher ratio

indicators.name: Male Student Enrolment
indicators.description: Percentage of male school-aged population enrolled in school

indicators.name: Total Student Enrolment
indicators.description: Percentage of school-aged population enrolled in school

indicators.name: Higher Education Degrees
indicators.description: Number of higher education degrees per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Residential Electrical Use
indicators.description: Total residential electrical energy use per capita (kWh/year)

indicators.name: Authorized Electrical Service
indicators.description: Percentage of city population with authorized electrical service

indicators.name: Public Building Electricity Use
indicators.description: Energy (electricity) consumption of public buildings per year (kWh/m²)

indicators.name: Electricity from Renewable Sources
indicators.description: Percentage of total energy derived from renewable sources, as a share of the city's total energy consumption

indicators.name: Total Electrical Use
indicators.description: Total electrical energy use per capita (kWh/year)

indicators.name: Electrical Interruptions
indicators.description: Average number of electrical interruptions per customer per year

indicators.name: Electrical Interruption Length
indicators.description: Average length of electrical interruptions (in hours)

indicators.name: PM2.5 Concentration
indicators.description: Fine Particulate Matter (PM2.5) concentration

indicators.name: PM10 Concentration
indicators.description: Particulate Matter (PM10) concentration

indicators.name: GHG Emissions
indicators.description: Greenhouse gas emissions measured in tonnes per capita

indicators.name: NO2 Concentration
indicators.description: NO₂ (nitrogen dioxide) concentration

indicators.name: SO2 Concentration
indicators.description: SO₂ (sulphur dioxide) concentration

indicators.name: O3 Concentration
indicators.description: O₃ (ozone) concentration

indicators.name: Noise Pollution
indicators.description: Noise pollution

indicators.name: Change in Native Species
indicators.description: Percentage change in number of native species

indicators.name: Debt Service Ratio
indicators.description: Debt service ratio (debt service expenditure as a percentage of a municipality's own-source revenue)

indicators.name: Capital Spending
indicators.description: Capital spending as a percentage of total expenditures

indicators.name: Own-Source Revenues
indicators.description: Own-source revenue as a percentage of total revenues

indicators.name: Taxes Collected
indicators.description: Tax collected as percentage of tax billed

indicators.name: Number of Firefighters
indicators.description: Number of firefighters per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Number of Fire-Related Deaths
indicators.description: Number of fire related deaths per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Natural Disaster-Related Deaths
indicators.description: Number of natural disaster related deaths per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Volunteer Firefighters
indicators.description: Number of volunteer and part-time firefighters per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Emergency Response Time
indicators.description: Response time for emergency response services from initial call

indicators.name: Fire Response Time
indicators.description: Response time for fire department from initial call

indicators.name: Voter Participation Rate
indicators.description: Voter participation in last municipal election (as a percentage of eligible voters)

indicators.name: Women Elected to Office
indicators.description: Women as a percentage of total elected to city-level office

indicators.name: Women Employed in City Government
indicators.description: Percentage of women employed in the city government workforce

indicators.name: Number of Corruption Convictions
indicators.description: Number of convictions for corruption and/or bribery by city officials per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Citizen Representation
indicators.description: Citizens' representation: number of local officials elected to office per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Number of Registered Voters
indicators.description: Number of registered voters as a percentage of the voting age population

indicators.name: Life Expectancy
indicators.description: Average life expectancy

indicators.name: In-Patient Hospital Beds
indicators.description: Number of in-patient hospital beds per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Number of Physicians
indicators.description: Number of physicians per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Under Age Five Mortality Rate
indicators.description: Under age five mortality per 1 000 live births

indicators.name: Number of Nurses/Midwives
indicators.description: Number of nursing and midwifery personnel per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Number of Mental Health Practitioners
indicators.description: Number of mental health practitioners per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Suicide Rate
indicators.description: Suicide rate per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Indoor Recreation Space
indicators.description: Square metres of public indoor recreation space per capita

indicators.name: Outdoor Recreation Space
indicators.description: Square metres of public outdoor recreation space per capita

indicators.name: Number of Police Officers
indicators.description: Number of police officers per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Number of Homicides
indicators.description: Number of homicides per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Number of Property Crimes
indicators.description: Crimes against property per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Police Response Time
indicators.description: Response time for police department from initial call

indicators.name: Number of Violent Crimes
indicators.description: Violent crime rate per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Population Living in Slums
indicators.description: Percentage of city population living in slums

indicators.name: Number of Homeless
indicators.description: Number of homeless per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Unregistered Households
indicators.description: Percentage of households that exist without registered legal titles

indicators.name: Residential Solid Waste Collection
indicators.description: Percentage of city population with regular solid waste collection (residential)

indicators.name: Solid Waste Collected
indicators.description: Total collected municipal solid waste per capita

indicators.name: Solid Waste Recycled
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's solid waste that is recycled

indicators.name: Disposal by Landfill
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's solid waste that is disposed of in a sanitary landfill

indicators.name: Disposal by Incinerator
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's solid waste that is disposed of in an incinerator

indicators.name: Disposal by Burning Openly
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's solid waste that is burned openly

indicators.name: Disposal by Open Dump
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's solid waste that is disposed of in an open dump

indicators.name: Disposal by Other
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's solid waste that is disposed of by other means

indicators.name: Hazardous Waste Generated
indicators.description: Hazardous waste generation per capita

indicators.name: Hazardous Waste Recycled
indicators.description: Percentage of city's hazardous waste that is recycled

indicators.name: Internet Connections
indicators.description: Number of internet connections per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Cell Phone Connections
indicators.description: Number of cell phone connections per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Landline Connections
indicators.description: Number of landline phone connections per 100 000 population

indicators.name: High-Capacity Public Transit
indicators.description: Kilometres of high capacity public transport system per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Light Passenger Public Transit
indicators.description: Kilometres of light passenger public transport system per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Public Transit Trips
indicators.description: Annual number of public transport trips per capita

indicators.name: Number of Automobiles
indicators.description: Number of personal automobiles per capita

indicators.name: Mode Share
indicators.description: Percentage of commuters using a travel mode to work other than a personal vehicle

indicators.name: Number of 2-Wheeled Vehicles
indicators.description: Number of two-wheel motorized vehicles per capita

indicators.name: Bicycle Paths
indicators.description: Kilometres of bicycle paths and lanes per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Transportation Fatalities
indicators.description: Transportation fatalities per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Commercial Air Connectivity
indicators.description: Commercial air connectivity

indicators.name: Green Area
indicators.description: Green area (hectares) per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Trees Planted
indicators.description: Annual number of trees planted per 100 000 population

indicators.name: Informal Settlements
indicators.description: Areal size of informal settlements as a percentage of city area

indicators.name: Jobs/Housing Ratio
indicators.description: Jobs/housing ratio

indicators.name: Wastewater Collection
indicators.description: Percentage of city population served by wastewater collection

indicators.name: No Wastewater Treatment
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's wastewater that has received no treatment

indicators.name: Primary Wastewater Treatment
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's wastewater receiving primary treatment

indicators.name: Secondary Wastewater Treatment
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's wastewater receiving secondary treatment

indicators.name: Tertiary Wastewater Treatment
indicators.description: Percentage of the city's wastewater receiving tertiary treatment

indicators.name: Potable Water Service
indicators.description: Percentage of city population with potable water supply service

indicators.name: Improved Water Access
indicators.description: Percentage of city population with sustainable access to an improved water source

indicators.name: Improved Sanitation Access
indicators.description: Percentage of population with access to improved sanitation

indicators.name: Domestic Water Consumption
indicators.description: Total domestic water consumption per capita (litres/day)

indicators.name: Total Water Consumption
indicators.description: Total water consumption per capita (litres/day)

indicators.name: Water Service Interruptions
indicators.description: Average annual hours of water service interruptions per household

indicators.name: Water Loss
indicators.description: Percentage of water loss (unaccounted for water)
